Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Marcus Smart?

Marcus Smart is 31 years old.

Where was Marcus Smart born?

Marcus Smart was born in Flower Mound, Texas.

When was Marcus Smart born?

Marcus Smart was born on March 6, 1994.

How tall is Marcus Smart?

Marcus Smart is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much does Marcus Smart weigh?

Marcus Smart weighs 220 lbs (99 kg).

Is Marcus Smart in the Hall of Fame?

Marcus Smart is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Marcus Smart drafted?

Marcus Smart was drafted by Boston Celtics, 1st round (6th pick, 6th overall), 2014 NBA Draft.

What position does Marcus Smart play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

What is Marcus Smart's net worth?

Marcus Smart has made at least $122,047,707 playing professional basketball.

How much does Marcus Smart make?

Marcus Smart made $20,210,284 in 2025.

What does Marcus Smart average?

Marcus Smart averages 9.8 points, 2.4 rebounds, and 3.2 assists per game.

How many rings does Marcus Smart have?

Marcus Smart has won 0 championships.

What is Marcus Smart's Instagram account?

Marcus Smart is on Instagram at youngamechanger.

What schools did Marcus Smart attend?

Marcus Smart attended Edward S. Marcus in Flower Mound, Texas and Oklahoma State.

What are Marcus Smart's nicknames?

Cobra, Wolverine are nicknames for Marcus Smart.
